articles.title: Goldman Sachs Analyst Lowers Its Price Target For Li Auto Inc. (LI)
articles.mainIdea: Goldman Sachs Analyst Lowers Its Price Target For Li Auto Inc. (LI)
articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Goldman Sachs Analyst Lowers Its Price Target For Li Auto Inc. (LI). Li Auto Inc. (NASDAQ:LI) is among 10 Best EV Stocks to Buy Heading into 2026. As reported by TheFly, Goldman Sachs lowered its price target for Li Auto Inc. (NASDAQ:LI) from $30.90 to $27 on December 1 and still maintained a Buy rating. As noted by Goldman Sachs analyst Tina Hou, the company’s third-quarter results […] Related tickers mentioned: LAAOF.

articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Li Auto And 2 More Growth Companies With Strong Insider Confidence.
